short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free eyedropper tool for capturing website colors. Features live color picking, plus color history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing our latest feature, the Color Picker - Web Development: A powerful addition to our Color Picker extension that enhances your web design workflow. The Color Picker - Web Development is a free eyedropper tool designed specifically for capturing website colors, offering live color picking and an innovative color history feature.

With the Color Picker - Web Development extension, you not only have access to the precise eyedropper and color selection tool but also a dynamic way to visualize and manage your color choices. This new feature takes your color exploration to the next level by providing real-time color picking from web pages, complete with an intuitive interface and enhanced functionality.

Key features of the Color Picker - Web Development include:

Live Color Picking: Effortlessly capture colors from any site as you browse, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in your design process.

Color History: Keep track of your recently selected colors, allowing you to revisit and reuse them seamlessly.
